full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN SKYES BU CHEN PO'I GSOL KHA 'PHRIN LAS MYUR BSGRUB ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007B (DAM CAN SKYES BU CHEN PO'I GSOL KHA 'PHRIN LAS MYUR BSGRUB ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG, GRUB THOB AU RGYAN SLOB DPON PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS KYI RING LUGS CUNG @008A *, ,ZAD MING TZAM 'CHANG BA, CES DAM CAN SKYES BU CHEN PO'I CHAS 'BUL MNGA' GSOL GNYER GTANG DANG BCAS PA 'DI YANG, RANG GIS SLOB BU BRTZON 'GRUS RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BSKUL BA'I RKYEN GYIS, BLA MA DAM PA'I BKA' 'BANGS KYI THA SHAL DED RANG RIG PA'I GNAS LUNG DANG RTOGS PA'I YON TAN MA SBYONGS DANG BLO BUL PHRA ZHING 'PHONGS TSUL BZHIN SDEBS SBYOR BKA' GYUR YANG, BLA MA DAM PA'I ZHAL GDAMS KYIS BDUD RTZI'I CUNG ZAD MYONG BA LA BRTEN NAS, LHA BTZUN BLO BZANG YE SHES DPAL 'BYOR GYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA PHYOGS THAMS CAD DAR ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE'O, ,MANGGA LAm, ,BKRA SHIS NI,)
